website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Nexus is a big step forward for Android, but it's not the giant leap you may have been expecting. As impressive as it is, Ice Cream Sandwich can be messy, and without it, the Galaxy Nexus is just another Nexus device.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Nexus brings a ton of new and very welcome features with Ice Cream Sandwich
The design is sharp, the screen is gorgeous, and the internal performance is fantastic
cons: Ice Cream Sandwich has eliminated some of Android's learning curve in some aspects, just to re-create it in others
There was some static on calls, and there's no external memory card slot
Also, like other Samsung Galaxy devices, the Galaxy Nexus feels rather fragile

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it was unlocked. Bought this phone over a year ago and it has lasted very well. Everything is updated regularly from Google as it is unlocked. Pairs well with T-mobile prepaid plans or any other prepaid on a GMS. Does not work with CDMA chips nor Micro Sims, eg (apple). From people I've know this phone can work in other countries off a GMS chipset from a local carrier. Will repeat business when the phone eventually gives out. Perfect for the price. Love the fact that it comes without many apps on it. Didn't need to root it since it didn't come with a ton of Ad-aware or advertisement from the actual company bought from.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone
customer_reviews.text: I have come to love the "Google" phones because of the openness and the ability for the latest and greatest updates and features. I purchased this unlocked version of the device since I use AT&T and have have not been disappointed. Not only is the screen beautiful but it's very responsive. Ice Cream Sandwich runs extremely smooth on the phone as you would expect. I would highly recommend this phone to anybody who wants the best Android phone on the market. The price is realistic compared to other devices without a contract. Not to mention that when you buy the phone out right you don't have to renew a contract to be stuck in.
customer_reviews.author: CRR

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Simply great! I love this phone and I am so damn glad I decided to buy this instead of the Nexus 4. Being able to replace the battery at need is a plus that saved me during a recent trip to Asia. My phone was camera, GPS, and source of information for the whole day. Dead battery? No problem: grab the spare one and replace the dead one. On a Nexus 4 you gotta plug it in and, honestly, I don't think I would enjoy holding in my hands both the phone and a USB charging pack while I am walking around and using the phone constantly.
customer_reviews.author: ALex

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend to use as a cheap unlocked phone to use with a compatible sim card. From what I saw from using it, it operated and worked great with the sim card. The phone is quick enough for simple apps such as Facebook & Instagram. I would probably pick one up if I were traveling to a new country and just wanted to use a sim card with a prepaid plan on a unlocked phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T.

customer_reviews.title: The best smartphone ever!
customer_reviews.text: Used this baby for one year, then sold it to a friend and he used it for one more year... still rocking with root and cyanogenmod! Of course, it doesn't keep up with today needs, but is a good backup smartphone
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ponte

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this phone on the O2 network in Germany. I have rooted and unlocked it and have a custom rom installed. I have a case and a screen protector. The phone is fast, gets updates quickly, the camera is really good for a phone. It is not quad core but there is nothing I have done with it that I had just wished it had been faster. This thing is rock solid with a great screen. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, although not produced by the seller, he shipped the same day I ordered, and I received the package the very next day! This thing came from the Netherlands to US (GSM Unlocked) which is fantastic shipping and an unlocked phone is great for travel. If anyone is iffy about this phone and any current HTC/Motorola phone, they don't match up to this, do a google search for comparisons. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Miad

customer_reviews.title: Nice cellphone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is really great! good photo quality, quick response,nice looking, big screen etc. But one bad thing, is that sometimes it can get very hot! therefore ,sometimes it can be really uncomfortable. The unfortunate thing, is that the seller (Go4Computers) didn't send me the package with the Google/Samsung seal. But, I didn't return it. I'm still using it, and so far nothing happened. I'm running factory stock rom, 4.1.1 JB no root.
customer_reviews.author: xavier

customer_reviews.title: Greatest phone ever!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! the delivery was cool, the attention of the seller was nice, but the phone is even coller, I'd say even better than the iphone, if those guys in Apple don't come up soon with something capable of outsmarting Samsung, they will sooner than later take over the whole smartphone market! the technical specifications, pors and cons you can find them a lot in here in the previous commetns but in general terms in you are thinking about buying this phone, don't even hesitate just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Thejerry

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Nexus SC-04D Docomo (yakjuxe)
customer_reviews.text: it is for Japanese market,and all instructions are written in Japanese,that is Samsung Galaxy Nexus SC-04D Docomo(yakjuxe),the box was not sealed,but it looks like brand new anyway,smartphone have an operating system Android 4.0.1 yakjuxe,therefore Google will not update Android to version 4.0.4,but thanks to the good people I am flash the system myself...
customer_reviews.author: Westbuyer

customer_reviews.title: nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Overall good experience. I would reccomend a Nexus 4 instead ,but if you can't get one the Galaxy Nexus is a good alternative. What Galaxy Nexus has that Nexus 4 doesn't : - fast shutter camera (a.k.a. zero lag shutter) - the camera has a higher brightness setting (it has +3 to -3 while Nexus 4 only has +2 to -2 ) - curved display glass - less likely to show scratches on the back because of the polycarbonate back cover - sAMOLED+ HD display ,for some,is a plus (although because of Pentile pixel arrangement the display has 50% less pixels than a LCD/IPS+ display of equal PPI). Vibrant colours of the AMOLED display look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: Love this Phone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone to help me switch from a contract with Sprint to Tmobile no contract. Have used it for 2 days now (I know thats not long) but its super fast, screen is big, has front and back camera for skype, its easily customizable, easy to download apps. I am sad that it doesnt have the little piece under the back cover to put the lanyard if you wear your phone around your neck like me --but that is minor/my own personal issue. I love this phone. I would write more and get all techy but other reviewers have hit it right on the nail. Great phone!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jay, AKA..

customer_reviews.title: 2nd To None!!
customer_reviews.text: Even thou this is a year old this phone still has the technology to be considered for a great phone. 4.6 inch screen, dual core processor, lastest updates from google, and the unique curved design that fits right into your hand. As well as the removalable battery is a bonus because most new phones have a non removable battery (Nexus 4), but all in all a great phone to cuctomize, root, and the 16 gb to 32 gb storage space!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice phone!
customer_reviews.text: Got it before Nexus 4 was out. Great bang for the buck back then. Nexus 4 beats it on this front, though. Pros: Great screen Original ("vanilla") android, with no skins and such NFC Good build quality - 6 months no silicon case or screen protector, as good as new. Cons: Battery life could be better Not a good bang to the buck today as it was at launch. (Get a nexus 4)
customer_reviews.author: Dor

customer_reviews.title: and ran Cyanogenmod like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Served me well for about three years, and ran Cyanogenmod like a dream. Battery life could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: P. B.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Nexus.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the best cellphone I've ever had, the fact of being a device powered by google make the experience of using it awesome, does anything you expect and want it to do, I bought mine from FGS Trading and I've to say that is one of the best electronic seller I've bought from, the cellphone came at the right time (maybe earlier), in the original seal box and as describe from the seller. Once you start using the phone it upgrade to Jelly Bean which is actually the best android software by now for me, if you have doubts go do a search for comparative videos and see it for yourself. This Phone is the best choise.
customer_reviews.author: Williams Machado

customer_reviews.title: samsung galaxy nexus
customer_reviews.text: My first android phone, am actually typing the review with the phone, awesome phone pure Google experience is just incredible, I could have gone with an s3 but I did not. I chose this phone for the main reason that it's a nexus device and, this means I will always have the latest and greatest android version from Google. Apart from that I like to be able to swap out my battery, and that's why I didn't buy the nexus 4. well I have this phone for the past 2 months and it works a great. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: techsaviiy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived before due date. Everything is just perfect. The new ice cream sandwich is awesome! It is really good looking, performs real fast functions and has enough memory for the basic stuff. The only con is that battery does not last long. I am very satisfied costumer because before this I only had Symbian System cell phones and I didnt really want an iPhone so I would strongly recommend this one if you are an Android fan. It worked perfectly though the GSM unlocked version is steady here but its a shame we dont have 4G yet.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio Mascia - Brazil

customer_reviews.title: Samsung does it all
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I am able to say about this device is that is one of the best. If you know how to handle it, you will take the maximum of it in every single aspect. About the battery, as all smartphones, it wont last that long but that's an easy fix buying 2500 mAh extra batteries. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Still rocking in 2014 (no problems for two years since i purchased the phone) - Completely hackable - Solid hardware Cons: - Not being updated to kitkat by google (although the hardware can support it) - Stock android is a little boring, but i guess ios is worst.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Villavicencio

customer_reviews.title: Nice unlocked phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice unlocked phone for the price. It has a good processor and a nice size for touch screen. The only con is the brightness of the screen. I could be a little brighter, because it is difficult to see outside on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio Luz

customer_reviews.title: very good phone at his time
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone a while ago then replaced for a Moto G, very good phone at his time, my reason to replace it was the 18months no more upgrade policy, since i wanted a taste of Kit Kat Stock, works fine with multitasking and it's really fluid, nice comfortable phone, i really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked and brand new and directly upgradable toJelly Bean OS
customer_reviews.text: I bought from Surge Telecom. It arrived quickly and brand new (sealed). The handset came unlocked (GSM/HSPA+ penta band) and running ICS 4.0.4. Within an hour of powering on, it prompted me to install Jelly Bean 4.1.1 build JRO03C via OTA update. I am impressed with the fluidity of the latest stock Android OS from Google. After using the phone for couple of days, I have not come across any problem with the phone. So overall I am happy with my purchase. Great seller and experience!
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy user
customer_reviews.text: It's been three weeks since I received my Nexus, and I couldn't be more happy with it. ICS is a step on the right direction for Android. A minor bug so far, is Bluetooth not being able to initialize after plane mode, which is fixed rebooting the phone. Hope this gets fixed on next Google update, but anyway I don't use bluetooth that much, so I'm ok. It works nicely on both T-Mobile and Telcel from Mexico with just swapping sim cards.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar P

customer_reviews.title: BREED - Unscrupulous seller
customer_reviews.text: My problem is not so much with the phone itself, but with the seller. I originally placed an order for a new unlocked phone. The one I actually got was an open box locked device. It did not have shrink wrap and was covered in fingerprints. The manual included in the shipment looked home made and described an earlier version of Android. The company that sold me the phone was called "Breed". Its shipment came from North Las Vegas.
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: One of the finest smart phones
customer_reviews.text: I really cannot say much about galaxy nexus.. it really does it all! My only note, it will take some time getting used to the new phone.. specially for someone came from another platform (Nokia).

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just keep it away from the rain...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but was out one night in the rain for a couple of minutes and it never worked again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Alberto

customer_reviews.title: You just cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: just perfect !! great product.. great packing.. It did not come with earphones. Other than that, no complaints.. i am an Android buff and a fan of pure google UI.. SO, i loved it. as everyone else said.. it does have average battery backup but when you are dealing with huge screens like this, you know what you are getting into. at the given price, its a pretty good deal. Honestly, if you can get Nexus 4, its better than this.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas present and as she is still learning how to use it coming from a old flip phone she is really liking it. I did not want to get into a 2 or 3 year plan as I believe you end up paying an ridiculous price for the phone by the end of the term nor did I want to pay 700-800 dollars for a new smart phone out right so I bought this one a couple of years old for 300 dollars and it is more than she needs.

customer_reviews.text: Good product, but battery doesn't last long enough. But otherwise decent product!

customer_reviews.title: My First Unlocked phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first have to say that this my first unlocked Android phone ever. The only problems I have had was that it rebooted once and it acted a little flaky with in the first couple of hours using it but I think that maybe because of where I live. The area I live at the mobile network is somewhat spotty. Other then that the phone is All Google like one expects. It even updated to 4.0.2 couple of minutes after being setup. It really is the best phone I ever had.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: The front desk guy was very helpful expediting this order, he treated me very nicely. Also the product is brand new, fully functional and worked perfectly fine overseas (tested in Costa Rica with Movistar with no issues at all).

customer_reviews.title: Pure android, excelent design and durability

customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: excellent if it meets the expectations and good product delivered ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent if it meets the expectations and good product delivered on time in my locker in miami, good seller, thanks

customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 4 months, then the battery started to fail (I even got a new battery and did not last for even half day). Then by the 6th month it started to shut down while I was using it ...

customer_reviews.title: goog product
customer_reviews.text: good in all. gud price for a good products. the screen is perfect the colors are brilliant and after the actualitation to jelly bean is very very fast and smooth. the only bad is that this no detect the 4.2 jelly bean actualitation because the version that the seller send me was jakjuux and not jakju this second is the version witch google direct support the other is for samsung

customer_reviews.title: It started as a phone and it became my personal assistant

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift

customer_reviews.title: The best phone ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have this phone for the last 2 years and it is the best phone ever. It's powerful enough, great camera and amazing screen. Moreover it runs the stock Android, without any of the useless HTC/Samsung overlay. In addition this device always receives the Android updates first, much before any other device.
customer_reviews.author: Terlici

customer_reviews.title: Best cellphone I've ever owed
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a Motorola Milestone and it's a world of difference. My experience with this phone has been overall fantastic and it can handle anything that you throw at it. The new task manager for ICS is my favorite feature. The only bad features are the battery life which is subpar considering that this is Google's flagship phone and the 5MP camera.
customer_reviews.author: alexchiguire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot, so this is the perfect phone for me. The only problem is the battery life. It doesn't last the entire day when it's used normally ( few calls, some messages and normal internet use). I like it overall and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Almost the best
customer_reviews.text: An excellent Android phone! Good camera (but why not an 8Mb one?), good 16Gb storage (why not 32 and 64 versions?), good processing capacity provided by a dual core processor, and an outstanding display (HD resolution!!!), without "buts". Besides all, it's a good thing to have a Google phone to get the new Android versions early :D
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous reviewer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: it has good price and good product and quick sending. In a word, I am very satisfied about this mobile phone!!

customer_reviews.title: Best phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone I have ever owned! It worked right out of the box on T-Mobile and picked up HSPA right away. It is super light! My only gripe is the lack of steel in the build. Other than that it works great and very fast. The rotation animation is a bit slow but there is a developer option to speed it up. I still haven't changed it because it really doesn't bother me. GSM is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone E-V-E-R
customer_reviews.text: I was the first of among my friends to have the Galaxy Nexus and soon after many of them bought it themselves (we're talking about more than 10 people) - every one of them is very satisfied with this phone - it's a real killer - nothing that Galaxy S3 can compete with...
customer_reviews.author: Moshe Bixneshpaner

customer_reviews.text: Its a sprint phone, it still works fine it was given to me in very good condition but its a sprint phone so its not unlocked

customer_reviews.title: Big display Googlephone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is high resolution HD-ready display with 1280x800 pixels. Pen tile technology not spoil. Very clear, very smooth scrolling. But the screen is big for my fingers, one-hand work is difficult. Battery life is 1-2 days. Camera very fast! Plastics is so-so. Android ICS very good system.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cell phone, its functionality is impressive. Also, the seller was very quick to ship it. I had no problems at all. The only concern is about the battery. If you intend to use your smartphone a lot, it's good to have a spare one. Besides that, everything is very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Camara

customer_reviews.title: Excelente
customer_reviews.text: I had an iPhone, and I really liked it. But this Galaxy nexus is pretty cool, easy to use, lots of options, and good reception for the Wi-Fi, I will only complain about the battery life, it goes very fast

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is hands-down the best phone on the market. Even with the new quad-core phones coming out, the Galaxy Nexus holds its own. Stock ICS, Pentaband HSPA+, and an amazing screen make it the best phone in existance. It is well worth the price to buy it unlocked.

customer_reviews.text: Fast, powerful and beautiful. Best phone I ever earn. And the best of it is that it upgrade the software when ever is available, Nexus products are awesome. I will totally recommend this product to all my friends and family.

customer_reviews.title: The best one
customer_reviews.text: It is the best phone, because it has the best combination of an excellent hardware manufactured by Samsung and the continuous updating of the Android OS from Google. I use it here in Ecuador and it works perfectly with Movistar mobile network.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Nexus
customer_reviews.text: Nexus is an amazing mobile fone. The screen resolution is very good and it's impossible to compare it to an Iphone. The camera of 5MP is also good. Android ICS is very fast and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely superb smart phone !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and use. doesn't get warm. great screen. smooth operation and best of all - automatic OS updates from Google keeps my phone up to date!

customer_reviews.text: even though it's not the newest cellphone on the market, it has anything the average user needs, and more. works better than any iphone, and and not far behind the Samsung Galaxy S III

customer_reviews.text: It is very fast, always updated, its size is super nice, it is also lighter and stronger materials are strong and your screen is sharp recommend

customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy a screen protector along with the phone. I've been using this phone for 3 weeks and I've already noticed a few scratches on the screen. I have been keeping the phone alone in my pocket and still a few scratches have appeared on the screen. Besides of this fact, the phone is awesome. Ice Cream Sandwich is just fantastic. I really recommend this phone.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could hope for in a phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful crafted phone, with an excellent operating system and an amazing touch screen. It's so convenient and intuitive, and it just feels very well constructed, and high quality all around. The only fault that I can find is basically that there is no SD card slot. That's a shame since this was one of the big advantages of Android. But it's so easy to just plug in any micro usb cable and transfer files, that it's not a big deal. The computer instantly recognizes the device. Other than that, it's all pretty nice. Battery could be better probably but that's pretty common. Bottom line: Buy this phone. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Arzon

customer_reviews.title: Great ICS device
customer_reviews.text: Bought this device to get the Ice Cream Sandwich OS and am really enjoying it. It takes great pictures, it is very fast with downloads and uploads and the battery life is great!! Used it internationally with a pre-paid SIM and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna van Greunen

customer_reviews.title: NOT FACTORY UNLOCKED
customer_reviews.text: THIS PHONE WAS BOUGHT FROM A CARRIER AND UNLOCKED BY THE SELLER, IT IS NOW USELESS ! Locked itself a week after regular use, and cannot be unlocked again. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER !
customer_reviews.author: cpons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is a beast. VERY smooth, very stable, ICS rules! I've been using it for a month and it never hung. Battery life is acceptable, I have wi-fi enabled, sync and localization all the time, and it works for a day and a half without recharging. Yesterday I installed Chrome for Android and it is awesome! I recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Espínola

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Nexus
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is amazing! I love it, just kind of annoyed that not all apps work well with ICS yet. I tend to reset the device because some widgets stop functioning properly like Google Voice. I have confidence that as the OS becomes more popular these issues will not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: dripple5
